name: Growsim
description:
"Growsim" is a medical marijuana simulation game.  Players take the role of a licensed grower selling product to patients and compassion centers.  The heart of the game is in discovering how to cultivate plants to their full potential; there are hundreds of strains and environmental factors.

This is the full version of Growsim with no restrictions or DRM of any kind.  

If you want to support the project, a cheat sheet is available for $1 from the site (growsim.blogspot.com).  The cheat sheet contains tips and tricks from the developer and a complete list of all secret unlock codes in the game.
